legal_basis: s. 39 of the Veterans Review and Appeal Board Act
s. 18.1 of the Federal Court Act
procedural_fairness: doubts in favor of the veteran if credible evidence supports their claim
evidence_assessment: medical evidence linking his condition to service
credibility_findings: dismissed without explicitly addressing its credibility or reasoning
decision_reasoning: did not resolve doubts in favor of the veteran
conclusion_outcome: application for judicial review is allowed in part
result_of_case: case remanded for reconsideration with instructions
